{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=error|formula=or(
	ifgreater(0, baseSpeed), ifnan(baseSpeed),
	efficiency%1, ifless(efficiency, 0), ifgreater(efficiency, 32767), ifnan(efficiency),
	haste%1, ifless(haste, 0), ifgreater(haste, 256), ifnan(haste),
	fatigue%1, ifless(fatigue, 0), ifgreater(fatigue, 256), ifnan(fatigue),
	aqua%1, ifless(aqua, 0), ifgreater(aqua, 32767), ifnan(aqua),
	and(java, or(
		ifnan(Asubmerged), ifnan(Aefficiency), ifnan(Aspeed)
	)),
	and(ifless(hardness, 0), not(ifequal(hardness, -1))), ifnan(hardness)
)}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=damage|formula=
	ifzero(bedrock,
		(baseSpeed +ifgreater(baseSpeed, 1, min(1024, max(0,
				Aefficiency +ifzero(efficiency, 0, 1 +efficiency *efficiency)
			))))
			*(1 +0.2*haste)
			*switch(fatigue, 0, 1, 1, 0.3, 2, 0.09, 3, 0.0027, 0.00081)
			*ifzero(water, 1, min(20, max(0, Asubmerged *(1 +4 *aqua))))
			*min(1024, max(0, Aspeed)),
		(baseSpeed +ifgreater(baseSpeed, 1, ifzero(efficiency, 0, 1 +efficiency *efficiency)))
			*(1 +0.2*haste)*pow(1.2, haste)
			*pow(0.21, fatigue)
			*ifzero(and(water, not(aqua)), 1, 0.2)
	)/ifzero(ground, 5, 1)/ifzero(drop, 100, 30)
}}
